bibl.title: Recent Discoveries in the Royal Quarter of Alexandria.
bibl.note: Foundation of a monumental enclosure or colonnade. - Walls. - The Dromos. - Finds (pottery and roof tiles). - The destruction of the structures is dated to the second half of the II century B.C.
bibl.seg: RODZIEWICZ Mieczyslaw and Ahmed ABDEL FATAH, Recent Discoveries in the Royal Quarter of Alexandria.
Foundation of a monumental enclosure or colonnade. - Walls. - The Dromos. - Finds (pottery and roof tiles). - The destruction of the structures is dated to the second half of the II century B.C.
